text: How do I reset my password?
Go to Settings > Security > Change Password. You'll need your current password.
If you forgot your current password, use the Forgot Password link on the login page.
What's the deployment process for the new API?

1. Create a PR with your changes
2. Get at least 2 approvals
3. Merge to main
4. CI/CD will automatically deploy to staging
5. After testing, promote to production via the deploy dashboard
Can someone explain how our rate limiting works?
We use a sliding window algorithm with Redis. Each API key gets 100 requests per minute.
For higher limits, users can upgrade to premium which gives 1000 requests per minute.
